description:
This Lutz Academy Master Class will take you through all seven modes! Presented in a 9-part video series and paired with shape print-outs for each mode, Jared Cattoor will guide you step-by-step through each mode as you learn the construction, theory, and application of this complex concept

Modes are an incredibly important part of guitar theory. We’ve broken this complicated subject down into an easy to digest Master Class for all levels! Before diving into this comprehensive video series, make sure you know the basics like the musical alphabet and notes on the neck.

This course will take you step-by-step through each of the seven modes. You'll begin with an introduction to modal theory in general, and then go in order through the modes as you learn the theory and application of each (with a chance to practice along with a custom backing track!). 

You'll also find free print-outs for each mode showing you all the shapes. By the end of the course, you'll be able to apply any of the modes within any key or song you choose!

To conclude, there will be a wrap up video that ties everything together and offers final tips for practice and application.
title: Modal Theory for Guitar
